blocks.content: Lego Price Tracker — Real-Time Deal Monitoring & Alerts.

This custom web application tracks discounted Lego sets across 29 major retailers, scraping prices hourly and storing them in a MySQL database. Since December 2022, it’s been collecting historical pricing data and continues to run today.
🔔 Telegram Alerts for price drops below user-defined thresholds.
🧩 Personalized Views: filter by owned sets, wishlist items, or exclude unwanted sets.
📦 Daily Sync with Rebrickable's dataset for set details like piece count.
🏷️ MSRP Updates via scraping from Lego.com and the BestBuy API (which is impressively free and reliable).
🛒 eBay Listings: buy-it-now, free shipping deals shown on a separate page with shared filters (not tracked due to data inconsistency).

The backend is powered by a .NET API and Angular frontend, hosted on a local IIS server. Scheduled tasks — including MSRP updates, Rebrickable syncs, and alert dispatches — run on the same server. The database is hosted on Bluehost.
